channel.title: Help, need a java command for randomizing the keyboard!
channel.description:
I'm looking for a java command so I can swap all of the keyboard buttons around. EX:
The command randomizes the buttons. So when I press a key on the keyboard it types a different letter/number, whether random or set. This needs to only last 360 seconds, which I can set the time on it myself.

item.title: Help, need a java command for randomizing the keyboard!
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

It’d be pretty easy, just a command that puts in a key

Ex> else if(command.startsWith("a")){ typePlayerKey(); setRandom(360); }
Or what ever

Just search a few tutorials on Sun Java (Google if you don’t know about it)

Read full topic
